column4: When seting up partitions on Ubuntu 9.10, what is the best file system to use ? EXT4, EXT3, EXT2 ?
best is subjective.. so whatever works for you is best
: i know nothing about any of them. Not sure if anybody knew. I will be using it as a file server
if you dont know the difference then i wouldnt worry about too much. Personally i use EXT2 for my storage and, EXT3 for server drives and EXT4 for workstations
: ok, I have it set up on a RAID 1 configuration with 2 1 gig SATA drives. will EXT3 be the best bet still ?
again as i said before, there is no "best", but yes, EXT3 will work just fine for that setup
